parameters.name: UVFlag
parameters.description: Parametric axis; either swSplitFaceOnParamU or swSplitFaceOnParamV

parameters.name: Parameter
parameters.description: Position along the parametric axis at which the split will be performed

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: True if the operation was successful, false if not

title: IModeler.ISplitFaceOnParamCount2
description: Sets up and counts the number of new faces split on the U or V parameter.
signature:
System.Int32 ISplitFaceOnParamCount2( 
   Face2
Facedisp
,
   System.Int32
UVFlag
,
   System.Double
Parameter
,
   out System.Boolean
Status
)

parameters.name: UVFlag
parameters.description: Parametric axis; either swSplitFaceOnParamU or swSplitFaceOnParamV

parameters.name: Parameter
parameters.description: Position along the parametric axis at which the split will be performed

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: True if the operation was successful, false if not

remarks:
The split is defined by calling this method. Then, you can retrieve the list of new faces by using
IModeler::ISplitFaceOnParam2
.
